english.segment1: I've been running nowhere street. I've got to mend my bloody feet. I've thrown away ten thousand days. I've hidden black and white and painted gray
english.segment2: In my weakness, out of pride. I failed to see the other side. It's a lost and broken war. That I won't fight for anymore
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. Where did I go wrong?. A shattered life, a wasted song. I composed, I lived and wrote each one. What is destiny?. To Live and Love and Die Honorably. So I'll trade My Eclipse for The Son
english.segment4: I want to make a difference. I want my life to make some sense. Cause when it's all over. I will have to answer for myself
english.segment5: I'm tearing down my rotten fence. And burying my weak defense. I want to crossover. Its time to take my heart off of the shelf
